title: How to get passing marks in class 12 physics - Quora

response.answer_text: Bring latest 10 previous year solved question paper booklet and practice all question with derivation and important formulas and give more importance to repeated question related topic. I can assure you that you will be able to pass your physics paper with 60% to 70% marks . this method is only applicable to 12th CBSE board exams but this is only for the LAST RESORT.  It can only help you to get passing marks but you cant clear your all doubt and understanding regarding this subject. MOST IMPORTANTLY Good command and proper understanding of this fascinating and captivating subject can help you in cracking many entrance exams of your interest. Again I am reminding you that above method is only for last resort. Good Luck for your exam.

First make a list of all the topic in your subject and choose those one which look easy to you and Also check how many questions comes from those topics which are easy to you . It will make easy to you grab passing marks in 12 physics

Try to learn all the derivations and problems and while preparing keep the blueprint of the paper next to u and learn the topic which r easy and have greater marks allotted, don't try to study anything at the day of exam, at the day of exam only revision should be done.All the best
Can you mention your blue print and board of examination?
